nodes.text: Krakin's Alehouse was a cantina that was located on the planet Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. It was established by an individual named Krakin and later fell into the hands of the Trandoshan Sossk, who had owned it for fifteen years by the time of the Clone Wars. After the crime lord Nirama was deposed by the Hutt Riboga, a number of criminals who had formerly worked for Nirama visted Krakin's Alehouse and discussed the experiences that they had while working for Nirama.

The cantina was filled with a pale yellow mist and the sound of cheap music, which was played from a set of old speakers. The building contained a number of small, round tables that were surrounded by durasteel chairs, for the patrons to sit on.
Krakin's Alehouse was created by Morrie Mullins and appeared in Remember When, an article that was added to Wizards.com in 2005 as part of the Living Force campaign.
